EN: Town Center
The Town Center provides the foundation necessary to grow your city.
Allows building a farm and a lumbermill. Town center can hold a maximum of 700 crop, 700 wood and 0 iron.
Enables building Barracks. Increases the maximum resources to 880 crop, 880 wood, and 0 iron.
Allows building University. Increases the maximum resources to 1130 crop, 1360 wood, and 0 iron.
Ability to build another Farm. Increases the maximum resources to 1450 crop, 1790 wood, and 0 iron.
Allows building Trading Posts. Increases the maximum resources to 1880 crop, 2320 wood, and 0 iron.
Increases the maximum resources to 2440 crop, 2960 wood, and 170 iron.
Increases the maximum resources to 3200 crop, 3740 wood, and 380 iron.  Ability to research Overtime.

Foundry
Allow the city's laborer to use wood to repair buildings after they have been damaged in combat. Ability to remove structures and build Refinery at higher levels.
Assign your city's laborers to repair damaged structures.
Increases to a maximum of 10 laborers.  One labor can repair up to 1 HP every 30 minutes.

Lumbering Camp
The camp is used by laborers to collect wood from Forests.
Tribal Gathering
A temporary tent where tribesmen hang out, get drunk and have a great time!
Shorten time required to produce new labors by 30% for 8 hours. (Nonstackable)
Tribal Fair
A temporary tent where tribesmen hang out, get drunk and have a great time!
Shorten time required to produce new labors by 30% for 1 day. (Nonstackable)

A temporary tent where tribesmen hang out, get drunk and have a great time!

A temporary tent where tribesmen hang out, get drunk and have a great time!
